channel.title: Big Producer Interviews with Todd Taskey - Growing Your Service Business
channel.description: Interviewing the industry's best financial advisors to learn their best ideas and what is really working for them.   It's like having your own business advisor, mentor and strategist all in one.  Click the subscribe button today - it's free!
channel.itunes:subtitle: Big Producer Interviews
channel.itunes:summary: Big Producer Interviews is a weekly podcast that asks great questions to some of the industries best advisors so you can learn what is really working for them and apply those lessons to your own business.
channel.itunes:author: info@bigproducerinterviews.com

image.title: Big Producer Interviews
image.description: Big Producer Interviews is a regular podcast that asks great questions to some of the industries best advisors so you can learn what is really working for them and apply those lessons to your own business.

item.title: Episode 11: Bud Casper 1/2 interviewed by Todd Taskey.
item.description: You've seen this "401K Master" in every industry magazine, now learn some of the secrets to his success and how you can penetrate the retirement plan market.. Part 1 of 2.
item.author: info@bigproducerinterviews.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Financial Planners Interviewed - Teaching about entrepreneurial ideas applicable to many types of businesses.
item.itunes:summary: Learn how each advisor became one of the industry's top producers. Each interview is entertaining, informative and focused on uncovering transferable ideas to help improve your business immediately. You will not want to miss a single interview.
item.itunes:author: Big Producer Interviews

item.title: Episode 10: Scott Hanson 2/2 interviewed by Todd Taskey.
item.description: How can a 40 year old financial advisor build a business with 2500 clients and $1 Billion assets? Scott Hanson's interview shares his exciting ideas that almost any advisor can replicate and grow their business quickly.. Part 2 of 2.
item.author: info@bigproducerinterviews.com
item.itunes:summary: Learn how each advisor became one of the industry's top producers. Each interview is entertaining, informative and focused on uncovering transferable ideas to help improve your business immediately. You will not want to miss a single interview.
